author: andschwa
body: I love having an icon, but we need a retina and 4K compatible icon given the increasing prevalence of high-definition monitors. It's looking a bit blurry.

comments.author: raghushantha
comments.body:
I originally got the pngs from @dhmsgit 

@HemantMahawar , @dhmsgit - Do we have high res images for the logo

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body:
@andschwa It's right here: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/assets/Powershell_256.png

That being said, I don't know how to stick it inline without ballooning its size. AFAIK, GFM doesn't support resizing inline.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: I'm going to replace it with the SVG.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: Never mind, I can't find an SVG....one day...

title: Need higher resolution PowerShell icon in readme
